document_data.name: Protection from Law
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from law''''' was an [[abjuration]] spell that created an aura around the target that shielded against mental and physical attacks by lawful creatures.
document_data.Effects: This spell functioned exactly like ''[[protection from evil]]'' except the bonuses and benefits applied to attacks from lawful creatures.
document_data.Components: In addition to verbal and somatic components, the caster had to draw a 3 ft (91 cm) circle around the recipient using powdered [[silver]].
